title: Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger is pay to win!
body: So, I just realised something: This skin has dragons as the turrets. This means that every time you kill a turret, you're effectively making your team harder to get drakes, as you're charging up Ancient Grudge stacks. This is a insane oversight that should be erradicated by ~~nerfing  tahm to not eat heimer turrets cause it happened in some pro play~~ nagging riot until they fix this glaring P2W bug.

replies.body: This gamebreaking bug also applies whenever you kill Dragon Trainer Tristana, because her dragon basically dies inside when its owner dies, adding an Ancient Grudge stack anyway. Ban those skins in LC$ thank you
